subject: Mental Health
title: Sleep and Depression
description: A short lesson to help you apply Sleep and Depression.

hook.text: Depressed people either can't sleep at all or can't stop sleeping.

buildup.text: Depression disrupts circadian rhythms, the internal clock governing sleep and wake.

twist.text: Sleep deprivation for one night can temporarily lift depression in some patients.

punchline.text: Depression hijacks the clock that runs your brain.

quiz.question: How does depression affect REM sleep?
options: It becomes more intense and arrives earlier
